deals.pitchHtml:

The San Francisco Beer and Music Festival

Beer lovers flock to the Soma District for the San Francisco Beer and Music Festival, now celebrating its third year of brews and tunes. Visitors can take advantage of unlimited samples of more than 50 craft beers, highlighting local favorites such as Lagunitas, Mad River, and Port Brewing Company.

Thanks to a prime location in the scenic Soma StrEats Food Park, plenty of food trucks will be on hand to fuel festival-goers. Sega Genecide will keep the crowd pumped with ’90s party music, and DJs Bass Punk will spin remixes of top hits paired with live drums.

deals.highlightsHtml: Handcrafted meals using the finest, seasonal ingredients are prepared by top chefs and delivered right to your door
deals.pitchHtml:
After purchasing this deal, you will need to visit the website listed on your Groupon voucher to complete redemption.

First Time Users Only

Choose Between Two Options

  • $20 for $40 Munchery credit
  • $40 for $80 Munchery credit
  • Single-serving dishes change every day.

Before purchasing the Groupon, please first make sure Munchery delivers to your neighborhood by checking their service areas here. Munchery also offers cooking kits, shipped weekly, to some additional areas—see here.

Munchery

Munchery has a whole new answer to “What’s for dinner?” When you’re too busy or too tired to cook, Munchery provides an option for fresh, chef-designed meals delivered right to your door to make sure the dinner hour is full of high quality eats and devoid of cooking stress.

  • Menu changes daily: Individual dishes mean everyone at the table can eat what they like, from shredded beef tacos or spiced chicken on minted couscous to seared ahi soba noodle salad and homey mac ‘n cheese.
  • Dinner delivered to your door, when you need it: No waiting for restaurants to open to take your order or scheduling food pick-up on your commute home.
  • Food that arrives chilled, for maximum freshness and ultimate flexibility: Heat it up when you’re ready to eat, no lukewarm pizza or tepid stir-fry again.
  • Feed more than yourself: Meals donated to a local food bank every time you order.
  • Munchery partners with The Conservation Fund to plant trees that off-set the environmental impact of deliveries. Munchery features bike delivery in dense urban areas, and food packaging is compostable and/or recyclable.
  • Prices on food and delivery reflect true costs, from quality ingredients to delivery employees.
How it Works

Customers can order Munchery via its website or iPhone or Android app. Pre-order food for dinner and select the best time for delivery. In select areas with on-demand ordering, customers can order food in the early evening for delivery within the hour.

deals.highlightsHtml: Diners dip veggies and bread into creamy cheese fondue and munch on fresh salads before cooking entrees fondue-style at the table
deals.pitchHtml:
Fondue is a ubiquitous staple of Swiss culture, matched only by neutrality, multiuse pocketknives, and the world’s most easy-to-draw cheese. Go for a dip with this Groupon.

Choose from Four Options

  • $89 for a three-course meal with after-dinner drinks for two and a bottle of wine (up to a $136 value)
  • $175 for the above meal for four with two bottles of wine (up to a $272 value)
  • $259 for the above meal for six with three bottles of wine (up to a $408 value)
  • $339 for the above meal for eight with four bottles of wine (up to a $544 value)

Each three-course meal includes:

  • Cheese fondue such as the spinach artichoke or traditional swiss with artisan bread, fresh vegetables, and apples
  • Salad
  • Entree fondue, which pits teriyaki sirloin, shrimp, and chicken breast cooked tableside in a vegetable broth, paired with five flavorful dipping sauces

House wine or champagne pairs with meals, and diners can choose from coffee, port, ice wine, or champagne for their after-dinner libation.

deals.highlightsHtml: Plaid Box meal kits delivered to your door provide everything needed to create meals in around 15 minutes
deals.pitchHtml:
After purchasing this deal, you will need to visit the website listed on your Groupon voucher to complete redemption.

First Time Users Only.

Choose Between Two Options

  • $25 for a small Plaid Box with two dinner cooking kits (four meals) ($51.95 value)
  • $34 for a large Plaid Box with three dinner cooking kits (six meals) ($69.95 value)

Before purchasing the Groupon, make sure Munchery delivers The Plaid Box to your neighborhood by checking the service areas here. If you live in the San Francisco Bay Area, Sacramento, Los Angeles, San Diego, Seattle, Portland, New York City, or Washington D.C., see here for same-day delivery.

Munchery

Nothing beats a homemade dinner, but it can be hard to find the time to plan, shop, prep, and cook one. The Plaid Box from Munchery brings customers chef-designed cooking kits that with ingredients for a fresh, delicious dinner for two on the table in about 15 minutes. Options range from chicken confit with endive salad to spicy ahi burgers, from steak and potatoes with truffle-infused butter to lamb kofta wraps.

How It Works

Customers can order The Plaid Box from the Munchery website. The Plaid Box is shipped weekly (you choose the day); customers can choose between lamb, fish, beef, pork, shellfish, poultry, or vegetarian preferences. Meals range from dinner salads to ahi tuna burgers, flatbreads, and more.

Wine-country travelers enjoy free tours and 15% off wine purchases at BobDog Winery in Cloverdale as well as reserve tastings for two at Alexander Valley Vineyards in Healdsburg. The bounty of offers always changes, but every deal is good for two people. Pass holders can add a second member to their card, or leave it open and bring a guest or of-age Nutcracker doll to each excursion.

deals.highlightsHtml: Growing kits include simple instructions and produce up to 2 pounds of shitake or tree-oyster mushroom; dried chanterelles used for cooking
deals.pitchHtml:

  • $13 for one shitake or tree oyster mini-mushroom farm (up to a $25 value)
  • $25 for two shitake or tree oyster mini-mushroom farms (up to a $50 value)
  • $6.50 for a two-ounce bag of dried chanterelles (a $10 value)

At the Far West Fungi storefront, customers can choose from pre-activated shitake or tree oyster mushroom mini-farms, each of which produces a guaranteed first crop. Shitake farms are ideal for indoor growing, producing up to one and half pounds of mushrooms over a four to five month period. Tree oyster mini-farms can grow in warm climates and produce one to two pounds of mushrooms, which can each reach the size of 3.5 inches in diameter, over a two-month growing period. With care, each farm can produce an additional two to three harvests.

deals.highlightsHtml: Make your own custom loose leaf tea blend by choosing from a variety of teas, flowers, herbs, fruits and extracts.
deals.pitchHtml:
After purchasing this deal, you will need to visit the website listed on your Groupon voucher to complete redemption.

Choose Between Two Options

  • $9.99 for a custom 2-ounce tea blend ($14.99 value)
  • $12.99 for a custom 4-ounce tea blend ($19.99 value)

The 2-ounce blend features 20 servings (3 grams each); the 4-ounce blend features 40 servings. Customers can choose to incorporate up to eight ingredients, including the available tea varieties, herbs, flowers, seeds, fruits, and more. They even create their own tea name and description for the label. You get to have fun, get creative and create your tea, your way.
